statements: SELECT * FROM financial_projections;
SELECT projection_name, projection_date, revenue FROM financial_projections WHERE expenses > 1000;
SELECT * FROM financial_projections WHERE revenue < 5000 AND projection_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT projection_id, projection_name FROM financial_projections ORDER BY projection_date DESC;
SELECT projection_date, revenue - expenses AS net_profit FROM financial_projections WHERE net_profit > 0;
SELECT * FROM financial_projections ORDER BY projection_date DESC, revenue ASC;
SELECT projection_name, revenue, expenses FROM financial_projections WHERE revenue > expenses;
SELECT projection_date, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM financial_projections GROUP BY projection_date;
SELECT * FROM financial_projections WHERE projection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY projection_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(revenue) AS average_revenue FROM financial_projections;
SELECT * FROM projections;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projections WHERE projection_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM forecasts WHERE forecast_id = 3;
SELECT projection_id, SUM(estimated_revenue), MAX(estimated_expenses) FROM forecasts GROUP BY projection_id;
SELECT project_name, forecast_date FROM projections INNER JOIN forecasts ON projections.projection_id = forecasts.projection_id ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM projections WHERE projection_id = 100;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projections ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT projection_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projections WHERE project_name LIKE 'Pro%' ORDER BY end_date;
SELECT f.forecast_id, p.project_name, f.estimated_revenue, f.estimated_expenses, f.forecast_date FROM forecasts f INNER JOIN projections p ON f.projection_id = p.projection_id;

SELECT p.project_name, SUM(f.estimated_revenue) AS total_revenue, SUM(f.estimated_expenses) AS total_expenses FROM projections p INNER JOIN forecasts f ON p.projection_id = f.projection_id GROUP BY p.project_name HAVING total_revenue > 10000 AND total_expenses < 5000;
SELECT * FROM financial_projections;
SELECT id, date, revenue FROM financial_forecasts WHERE projected_profit > 10000;
SELECT date, expenses, profit FROM financial_metrics WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, projected_revenue, projected_profit FROM financial_forecasts WHERE date = '2023-06-15';
SELECT * FROM financial_metrics WHERE cash_flow < 0;
SELECT * FROM financial_projections ORDER BY date DESC, revenue ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, date, revenue FROM financial_projections WHERE expenses > 10000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_forecasts WHERE projected_profit > 50000 AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, date, cash_flow FROM financial_metrics ORDER BY cash_flow ASC, date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT id, date, net_income FROM financial_metrics WHERE operating_income > 75000 AND date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM FinancialProjections;
SELECT projection_id, project_name, projected_revenue FROM FinancialProjections ORDER BY projected_revenue DESC;
SELECT comparison_id, projection_id, forecast_name, comparison_date FROM ForecastComparisons WHERE forecast_name = 'ABC';
SELECT * FROM FinancialTrends WHERE trend_type = 'Profit';
SELECT scenario_id, projection_id, scenario_name FROM ForecastScenarios WHERE projection_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM FinancialProjections WHERE projected_revenue > 10000;
SELECT project_name, projected_revenue FROM FinancialProjections ORDER BY projected_revenue DESC;
SELECT comparison_id, projection_id, forecast_name, comparison_date FROM ForecastComparisons WHERE comparison_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY comparison_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM FinancialTrends WHERE trend_value < 0 ORDER BY trend_value DESC;
SELECT scenario_id, projection_id, scenario_name, scenario_description FROM ForecastScenarios WHERE scenario_name LIKE '%best%' AND LENGTH(scenario_description) > 50 ORDER BY scenario_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_projections ORDER BY projection_date DESC, revenue ASC
SELECT projection_id, net_income FROM financial_projections WHERE expenses > 5000
SELECT * FROM sales_forecasts WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT forecast_id, product_id, unit_price FROM sales_forecasts WHERE quantity < 100
SELECT * FROM budget_allocations WHERE department_id = 3
SELECT * FROM financial_projections WHERE projection_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY net_income DESC;
SELECT projection_date, revenue, expenses FROM financial_projections WHERE net_income > 10000;
SELECT category, amount FROM expenses_details WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT * FROM budget_allocations WHERE department_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND remaining_amount > 0 ORDER BY allocation_date DESC;
SELECT forecast_date, product_id, quantity, unit_price FROM sales_forecasts WHERE forecast_date < '2022-06-01' AND unit_price < 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
